home.lead: Play your favorite board games with friends or other players around the world!.
home.lead2: Join the coolest board game community on the web. Start directly from your browser. No downloads or setup necessary.

istanbul.name: Istanbul
istanbul.description:
Het is een drukte van belang op de bazaar in Istanbul. Handelaren en hun assistenten haasten zich door de nauwe steegjes en proberen hun concurrenten te slim af te zijn. De sleutel tot succes ligt in een goede organisatie: assistenten vullen de handkarren bij de diverse pakhuizen en brengen deze vervolgens met gezwinde spoed naar de juiste bestemming.

Elke handelaar wil namelijk als eerste een bepaald aantal robijnen in zijn bezit krijgen. Zet je assistenten slim in en probeer de kostbare edelstenen sneller dan je tegenstanders te verzamelen in dit strategische spel!

gwt.name: Ranchers Of The Old West
gwt.summary: Herd your cattle along the trails of the Old West. Inspired by the popular game Great Western Trail.
gwt.description:
America in the 19th century: You are a rancher and repeatedly herd your cattle from Texas to Kansas City, from where you send them off by train. This earns you money and victory points.
Needless to say: Each time you arrive in Kansas City, you want to have your most valuable cattle in tow. This will not only require that you keep your herd in good shape, but also that you effectively utilize the various buildings along the trail.
Success will require that you hire capable staff: Cowboys to improve your herd, craftsmen to build your very own buildings and engineers to manage the important railroad line.

If you cleverly manage your herd and navigate the opportunities and pitfalls of this great western trail, you surely will gain the most victory points and win the game.

confirmStart: Some players have not yet responded. They will not be able to join the game. Do you still want to start the game?

popover.waitingForPlayer: Waiting for this player to perform an action.

about.title: About
about.text: This website is maintained by Tom Wetjens. I am a software developer by day and board gamer by night. The idea for this website came during the lockdown due to the Corona virus in 2020. As playing board games with friends in real life was no longer possible, I started looking at other ways.

specialThanks.title: Special Thanks
specialThanks.text: My wife Sharon for the patience and testing. Gerben, Niels, Erik, Judith, Irene also for testing. Sander for testing and making sound effects and songs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: This website is maintained by Tom Wetjens. Feel free to contact me about any issues, requests or suggestions. As there is currently no issue tracker yet, please submit any bug reports to my e-mail address.

gwt.confirmEndTurn: You can still perform actions. Are you sure you want to end your turn?
gwt.deliverRequiresCertificates: You must spend at least {{atLeast}} certificates to deliver to {{city}}.
gwt.deliverOptionalCertificates: Optionally, you may spend additional certificates when delivering to {{city}}, to get a higher payout.
gwt.spendCertificates: Select the number of certificates you want to use:

popover.handValue: The breeding values of each different type of cattle that you have in hand is counted towards your total breeding value. This means each type is counted only once, no matter how many cards of that type you have.
popover.certificates: The total number of certificates, both temporary certificates as indicated by the marker on the player's board, as any permanent certificates the player may have acquired through station master tiles.
popover.cattleCard: This is a {{type}} cattle card with breeding value {{breedingValue}} and worth {{points}} points.
popover.objectiveCard: This is an Objective Card that is worth {{points}} points. When played the player may: {{action}}. If not completed, the player will lose {{penalty}} points.
popover.buildings: View the buildings that are available.
popover.objectives: View the objectives that must be completed and the teepees and hazards collected.
popover.drawStack: The stack of cards from which new cards are drawn and added to your hand. Whenever the draw stack runs out, any discarded cards are shuffled and this becomes the new draw stack.
popover.discardPile: The cards that have been discarded. Whenever the draw stack runs out, any discarded cards are shuffled and this becomes the new draw stack.

log.EVERY_OTHER_PLAYER_HAS_1_TURN: every other player has 1 more turn
log.MAY_REMOVE_BLACK_DISC_INSTEAD_OF_WHITE: may remove a Black disc instead of a White disc
log.MUST_REMOVE_DISC_FROM_STATION: must remove a disc from a Station
log.MAY_REMOVE_HAZARD_FOR_FREE: may remove a Hazard for free
log.MAY_PLACE_CHEAP_BUILDING: may place a building for $1 per Craftsman
log.MAY_DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFICA: may discard 1 Jersey to gain 1 certificate
log.MAY_DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_2_CERTIFICA: may discard 1 Jersey to gain 2 certificates

action.APPOINT_STATION_MASTER: appoints {{value1}} to station master and receives {{value2}}
action.DISCARD_1_BLACK_ANGUS_TO_GAIN_2_CERTIFIC: discards 1 Black Angus to gain 2 certificates
action.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS_: disards 1 cattle card to gain $3 and must add 1 Objective Card to hand
action.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFIC: discards 1 cattle card to gain 1 certificate
action.DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFICATE_A: discards 1 Jersey to gain 1 certificate and $2
action.DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_MOVE_ENGINE_1_FORWAR: discards 1 Jersey to move engine 1 forward
action.DISCARD_1_OBJECTIVE_CARD_TO_GAIN_2_CERTI: discards 1 Objective Card to gain 2 certificates
action.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS: discards pair of cattle cards to gain $3
action.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_4_DOLLARS: discards pair of cattle cards to gain $4
action.DRAW_2_CATTLE_CARDS: adds 2 cattle cards to the cattle market
action.GAIN_2_DOLLARS_PER_BUILDING_IN_WOODS: gains $2 per building in the woods
action.GAIN_2_CERTIFICATES_AND_2_DOLLARS_PER_TE: gains 2 certificates and $2 per pair of teepees
action.MOVE_3_FORWARD_WITHOUT_FEES: moves cattleman to {{value1}} without having to pay fees
action.MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_1_CARD: moves engine 1 backwards to remove a card
action.MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_2_CARD: moves engine 2 backwards to remove 2 cards
action.MOVE_ENGINE_FORWARD_UP_TO_NUMBER_OF_BUIL: moves engine forward up to number of buildings in the woods
action.PAY_1_DOLLAR_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS: pays $1 and moves engine 1 backwards to gain 1 certificate
action.PAY_2_DOLLARS_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARD: pays $2 and moves engine 2 backwards to gain 2 certificates
action.SINGLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: wants to perform a single auxiliary action
action.SINGLE_OR_DOUBLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: wants to perform a single or double auxiliary action
action.USE_ADJACENT_BUILDING: wants to use actions of an adjacent Building
action.UNLOCK_BLACK_OR_WHITE: removes a disc from player board
action.UNLOCK_WHITE: removes a disc from player board

values.PERM_CERT_POINTS_FOR_TEEPEE_PAIRS: Permanent certificate + 3 points per teepee pair
values.REMOVE_HAZARD_OR_TEEPEE_POINTS_FOR_EACH_: Remove hazard/trade with Tribes + 3 points per 2 objective cards

errors.NOT_ENOUGH_COWBOYS: You don't have enough cowboys to perform this action.
errors.ALREADY_AT_SPACE: You already are at this space.
errors.ALREADY_DELIVERED_TO_CITY: You already delivered to this city.
errors.ALREADY_HAS_STATION_MASTER: You already have this station master tile.
errors.ALREADY_PLAYER_ON_SPACE: There is already another player on this space.
errors.AT_LEAST_2_PLAYERS_REQUIRED: You need at least 2 players to start this game.
errors.AT_MOST_4_PLAYERS_SUPPORTED: You can play this game with max 4 players.
errors.CANNOT_REPLACE_BUILDING_OF_OTHER_PLAYER: You cannot replace the building of another player.
errors.CANNOT_REPLACE_NEUTRAL_BUILDING: You cannot replace a neutral building.
errors.CANNOT_STEP_DIRECTLY_FROM_TO: You cannot move directly from your current location to this location.
errors.CARD_NOT_IN_HAND: You don't have this card in your hand.
errors.CATTLE_CARDS_NOT_IN_HAND: You don't have these cattle cards in your hand.
errors.CATTLE_CARD_NOT_AVAILABLE: This cattle card is not available.
errors.CITY_VALUE_MUST_BE_LESS_THEN_OR_EQUAL_TO: You must pick a city whose value is less than or equal to the number of spaces you moved your engine backwards.
errors.MUST_CHOOSE_ACTION: You must choose one of the actions.
errors.MUST_PICK_WHITE_DISC: You must pick a disc with white corners.
errors.MUST_SPECIFY_CATTLE_CARD: You must pick a cattle card.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_TO_PAY: You don't have enough balance to pay for this action.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_BREEDING_VALUE: You don't have enough breeding value to deliver to this city.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CATTLE_CARDS_OF_BREEDING_VALU: There are not enough cattle cards available with this breeding value.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CERTIFICATES: You don't have enough certificates to deliver to this city.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CRAFTSMEN: You don't have enough craftsmen to build this building.
errors.NOT_FIRST_ACTION: You must perform another action first.
errors.NO_ACTIONS: There are no actions to perform.
errors.NO_TEEPEE_AT_LOCATION: There is no teepee at this location.
errors.OBJECTIVE_CARD_NOT_AVAILABLE: This objective card is not available.
errors.REPLACEMENT_BUILDING_MUST_BE_HIGHER: You must pick a building that has a higher value than the one you are trying to upgrade.
errors.SPACE_NOT_REACHABLE: This space is not reachable with your engine right now.
errors.STATION_MUST_BE_BEHIND_ENGINE: The station must be behind your engine.
errors.STEPS_EXCEED_LIMIT: This location is not reachable within your current step limit.
errors.WORKERS_EXCEED_LIMIT: You cannot have more workers of this type.
errors.LOCATION_NOT_ADJACENT: This location is not adjacent to your current location.

errors.EXCEEDS_MAX_REALTIME_GAMES: You have reached the maximum number of realtime games you can play simultaneously.
errors.MIN_PLAYERS: You need more players to start the game.
errors.SERVER_NOT_AVAILABLE: The server is currently not available or too busy.
errors.CONNECTION_FAILED: Could not connect to server. Make sure you are not offline.
errors.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform the requested action or access the requested resource.
errors.ALREADY_INVITED: This user is already invited to the table.
errors.NOT_PLAYER_IN_GAME: You are not playing at this table.
errors.EXCEEDS_MAX_PLAYERS: You have reached the maximum number of players for this game.
errors.COMPUTER_NOT_SUPPORTED: This game does not support computer players.
errors.TOKEN_VALIDATION_ERROR: Login failed due to expired token. Make sure your system's clock is set correctly.

log.PROPOSED_TO_LEAVE: proposes to leave the table together
